answer1: Acquire precious gold jewellery by depositing money online.
answer2: Pay monthly installments via cash, UPI, NEFT, or IMPS to DC Jewellers' account. Contact showroom for details.
answer3: Gold and silver jewellery can be purchased as per terms and conditions.
answer4: Jewellery will be delivered only after scheme completion.
answer5: DC Gold Jewellery Scheme enables secure online gold accumulation. Start with â‚¹100 minimum, add anytime. Redeem accumulated gold weight after 330 days with bonus benefits as below.
answer6: Members agree to all scheme terms under Indian law.
answer7: Contact if receipt not received within 14 days of payment. Customers must verify payment records.
answer8: We respect your privacy and handle personal information confidentially. We never share your data with third parties.
answer9: Only voluntarily provided information: name, email, addresses, phone numbers for orders, newsletters, contests, or feedback.
answer10: To process orders, communicate updates, and send relevant offers. Unsubscribe anytime via email or link in communications.
answer11: No sharing for marketing purposes. Payments processed through third-party providers with security certifications.
answer12: Retained only as long as necessary to fulfill purposes: order processing or query resolution.
answer13: Cookies enhance online experience without storing personal data. They help with session management, shopping cart, and analytics. Used for service improvement and ad performance tracking.
answer14: Contact via website/email. Use valid contact details for efficient communication. Customers consent to transactional/promotional messages. Opt-out available for promotional content. We prioritize customer consent in communications.

fullDescriptionDiamond: Discover our stunning new diamond collection featuring the latest designs in engagement rings, wedding bands, and luxury jewelry. Get a flat 15% discount on all new arrivals in our diamond category.

privacyContactDescription: Contact us if you have any concerns about your privacy
privacyMidTitle: PLEASE READ THE FOLLOWING TERMS OF OUR PRIVACY POLICY ON PERSONAL INFORMATION COLLECTED
privacyPolicyDiscription: Protection and security of your personal information is one of the top priorities of **DC Jewellers **. This privacy policy discloses the practices of DC Jewellers  regarding the information collected from users of this website/mobile app. By using this website/mobile app, you agree to accept the terms of this privacy policy as well as the website/mobile app's Terms of Use. By accessing or using this website/mobile app, you expressly consent to the use of our website/mobile app and the disclosure of your personal information in any manner described in this privacy policy. This privacy policy extends to both users who visit the website/mobile app but do not transact business on the website, as well as users who are registered on the website. 'Personal Information' refers to any information that identifies or can be used to identify, contact, or locate the person to whom such information pertains, including but not limited to name, address, phone number, and email address.
privacyPolicyDiscription2: By accepting this privacy policy, you authorize **DC Jewellers ** to collect, store, and use any information that you provide on our website/mobile app. The information collected by us includes all information entered by you on our website/mobile app, such as your name, address, contact number, email ID, and any other information sent by you via emails to our email ID.

termsAndConditionsDiscription: Welcome to DC Jewellers for gold and silver ornaments. This website is owned and operated by DC Jewellers and is officially registered in Dindigul, Tamil Nadu, India. By using the services provided by https://dcjewellers.org, you agree to comply with the terms and conditions listed below, which may be updated periodically. DC Jewellers reserves the right to modify these terms and conditions at any time, without prior notice, at its sole discretion. All rights, including copyrights, belong to DC Jewellers. Without prior permission from DC Jewellers, copying, storing, or reproducing any content from this website, either fully or partially, is strictly prohibited. If you have any questions regarding these terms and conditions or any feedback about our website, you can reach us at dcjewellerstcr@gmail.com or contact our help desk at Mob. 99761 57984.

saveGoldByWeight: Save gold by weight with fixed monthly installments. Choose your target gold weight and pay fixed amounts monthly until you reach your goal.
saveByWeightSecureByDesign: Save by weight, secure by design
signAgreementAndMakeFirstPayment: Sign agreement and make first payment
goldWeightBasedFixedDescription: The Gold Weight Based Fixed scheme allows you to accumulate a specific amount of gold over time. You choose your target gold weight (e.g., 10 grams, 50 grams) and pay fixed monthly installments until you reach your goal. This scheme is perfect for those who have a specific gold accumulation target in mind.
fixedAmountSavingsPlan: Fixed amount savings plan where you save a predetermined amount monthly. Perfect for disciplined savings with predictable outcomes.
signAgreementAndPayFirstInstallment: Sign agreement and pay first installment
goldAmountBasedFixedDescription: The Gold Amount Based Fixed scheme is designed for disciplined savers who want predictable monthly payments. You choose a fixed amount to save each month and accumulate gold over the selected duration. This scheme helps build a regular savings habit.
ultimateFlexibilityInGoldSavings: Ultimate flexibility in gold savings. Save any amount, anytime without fixed schedules. Perfect for irregular income earners.
freedomToSavePowerToGrow: Freedom to save, power to grow
goldSavingsFlexibleDescription: The Gold Savings Flexible scheme offers maximum freedom in gold savings. You can save any amount, anytime without any fixed schedule or penalties. This scheme is ideal for freelancers, business owners, or anyone with irregular income patterns.

howToResetPasswordAnswer: To reset your password, go to the Profile tab, tap on 'Change Password', enter your current password, then set your new password. Make sure to use a strong password with at least 8 characters.
howToUpdateProfileAnswer: You can update your profile by going to the Profile tab and tapping on 'Edit Profile'. You can change your name, email, phone number, and profile picture.
howToCheckSavingsBalance: How to check my savings balance?
howToCheckSavingsBalanceAnswer: Your savings balance is displayed on the home screen. You can also go to the Savings tab to see detailed information about your savings schemes and transactions.
howToMakePaymentAnswer: To make a payment, go to the home screen and tap on 'Make Payment'. Select your payment method, enter the amount, and follow the on-screen instructions.
howToContactSupportAnswer: You can contact our customer support by calling +91-1234567890 or emailing dcjewellerstcr@gmail.com. Our support team is available 24/7 to help you.
howToTrackTransactionsAnswer: All your transactions are visible in the Transactions tab. You can filter by date, type, or amount to find specific transactions.
